languages.text: "Истинная плоть предала ее и обратилась в тяжкий груз металла, спрятанного в ее теле и превратившегося в нечто не замысленное Омниссией. Лишенное функции". {n}Последние слова Паскаль произносит с отвращением и горечью.{/n}

"Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Истинная плоть предала ее и обратилась в тяжкий груз металла, спрятанного в ее теле и превратившегося в нечто не замысленное Омниссией. Лишенное функции". {n}Последние слова Паскаль произносит с отвращением и горечью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “她的实肉已经背叛了她，变成了她体内沉重的金属负担。这并不是欧姆尼塞亚的造物，它没有任何实际功能。”{n}帕斯卡说出最后这句话时，语气中带着明显的厌恶与悲伤。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “她的实肉已经背叛了她，变成了她体内沉重的金属负担。这并不是欧姆尼塞亚的造物，它没有任何实际功能。”{n}帕斯卡说出最后这句话时，语气中带着明显的厌恶与悲伤。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Sa chair véritable l'a trahie pour se transformer en fardeau de métal dans son propre corps. C'est un phénomène dénué de fonction qui ne fait pas partie des desseins de l'Omnimessie, » {n}explique Pasqal sur un ton qui exprime clairement son dégoût et sa tristesse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Sa chair véritable l'a trahie pour se transformer en fardeau de métal dans son propre corps. C'est un phénomène dénué de fonction qui ne fait pas partie des desseins de l'Omnimessie, » {n}explique Pasqal sur un ton qui exprime clairement son dégoût et sa tristesse.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女の真なる肉は彼女を裏切り、彼女の身体の中で金属の重荷となった。万機神が意図した設計とは異なる。機能を失ったのだ」{n}パスカルは嫌悪と悲しみをこめて最後の言葉を口にした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼女の真なる肉は彼女を裏切り、彼女の身体の中で金属の重荷となった。万機神が意図した設計とは異なる。機能を失ったのだ」{n}パスカルは嫌悪と悲しみをこめて最後の言葉を口にした。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Su verdadera carne la traicionó y se tornó un armazón pesado de metal dentro de su cuerpo, lo cual no forma parte de los designios del Omnissiah. Su función es vestigial». {n}Pasqal pronuncia las últimas palabras con un rechazo y una congoja perceptibles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Su verdadera carne la traicionó y se tornó un armazón pesado de metal dentro de su cuerpo, lo cual no forma parte de los designios del Omnissiah. Su función es vestigial». {n}Pasqal pronuncia las últimas palabras con un rechazo y una congoja perceptibles.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr Wahres Fleisch hat sie verraten und ist zu einer schweren Last aus Metall in ihrem Körper geworden. Zu etwas, was nicht vom Omnissiah geplant wurde. Etwas, was keine Funktion hat." {n}Pasqal spricht die letzten Worte mit hörbarer Abscheu und Trauer.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr Wahres Fleisch hat sie verraten und ist zu einer schweren Last aus Metall in ihrem Körper geworden. Zu etwas, was nicht vom Omnissiah geplant wurde. Etwas, was keine Funktion hat." {n}Pasqal spricht die letzten Worte mit hörbarer Abscheu und Trauer.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Salt Suret'i kendisine ihanet ederek bedeni içinde metalden ağır bir yüke, Hermesih'in tasarımı olmayan bir şeye dönüştü." {n}Pasqal, son kelimelerini belirgin bir elem ve istikrah ile dile getiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Her True Flesh has betrayed her and become a heavy burden of metal within her body, something that is not of the Omnissiah's design. Something devoid of function." {n}Pasqal speaks the last words with audible disgust and sorrow.{/n}
